item.description:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="{{ with .Site.LanguageCode }}{{ . }}{{ else }}en-US{{ end }}">

  {{ partial "head.html" . }}
    {{ partial "js.html" . }}

  <body id="page-top" class="index">

    <!-- Google Tag Manager (noscript) -->
  <noscript><iframe src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-WBCZLRG" height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe></noscript>
<!-- End Google Tag Manager (noscript) -->

    {{ partial "nav1.html" . }}
    {{ partial "about.html" . }}
    {{ partial "contact-subscribe.html" . }}
    {{ partial "footer.html" . }}
    {{ partial "hubspot.html" . }}
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="{{ with .Site.LanguageCode }}{{ . }}{{ else }}en-US{{ end }}">

  {{ partial "head.html" . }}
    {{ partial "js.html" . }}

  <body id="page-top" class="index">

    <!-- Google Tag Manager (noscript) -->
  <noscript><iframe src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-WBCZLRG" height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe></noscript>
<!-- End Google Tag Manager (noscript) -->

    {{ partial "nav1.html" . }}
    {{ partial "resources.html" . }}
    {{ partial "contact-subscribe.html" . }}
    {{ partial "footer.html" . }}
    {{ partial "hubspot.html" . }}
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="{{ with .Site.LanguageCode }}{{ . }}{{ else }}en-US{{ end }}">

  {{ partial "head.html" . }}

  <body id="page-top" class="index">
    {{ if .Site.Params.services.enable }}
      {{ partial "resources-erp.html" . }}
    {{ end }}
    {{ partial "contact-subscribe.html" . }}

    {{ partial "footer.html" . }}

    {{ partial "js.html" . }}
    {{ partial "hubspot.html" . }}
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="{{ with .Site.LanguageCode }}{{ . }}{{ else }}en-US{{ end }}">

  {{ partial "head.html" . }}
    {{ partial "js.html" . }}

  <body id="page-top" class="index">
    {{ partial "nav1.html" . }}
    <!-- {{ partial "hero.html" . }} -->

      {{ partial "charisma.html" . }}

      {{ partial "contact.html" . }}

      {{ partial "footer.html" . }}

    {{ if .Site.Params.portfolio.enable }}
      {{ partial "modals.html" . }}
    {{ end }}

  </body>
</html>
